summary: The story of Cuban refugees who risked their lives in homemade rafts to reach the United States, and what life is like for those who succeed.
cast: Guillermo Armas|Maria Celeste Arraras|Rafael Cano|Fidel Castro|Bill Clinton|Oscar Del Valle|Mericys Gonzalez|Misclaida Gonzalez|Miriam Hernández|Juan Carlos Subiza
director: Directors: Carles Bosch (as Carlos Bosch), Josep Maria Domènech
title: Balseros
